text: Anikaze nimbone yini lowo owaphikisana no-Abrahamu ngeNkosi yakhe ngoba uMvelinqangi wayemnikile ubukhosi? Ngenkathi u-Abrahamu ethi, “iNkosi yami iyona eyiletha impilo futhi eyiletha ukufa” yathi, “mina ngiyaphilisa futhi ngiyabulala”. Wathi u-Abrahamu “ngempela uMvelinqangi wenza ukuthi ilanga liphume eMpumalanga ngakho-ke lenze liphume eNtshonalanga” ngakho-ke lowo ongakholwa wayedidekile (emangele) futhi uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abenza okubi
